com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class NodeSizeConstraintProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.NodeSizeConstraintProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INodeSizeConstraintProvider

    public class NodeSizeConstraintProvider
extends Object
implements INodeSizeConstraintProvider
    A simple default implementation of INodeSizeConstraintProvider.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      NodeSizeConstraintProvider(ISize minimumSize, ISize maximumSize)
      Creates a new instance using the provided size instances as the initial values.

      Creates a new instance using the provided size instances as the initial values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NodeSizeConstraintProvider

        public NodeSizeConstraintProvider(ISize minimumSize,
                                  ISize maximumSize)
        Creates a new instance using the provided size instances as the initial values.

        Not specifing the minimumEnclosedArea will set it to RectD.EMPTY.

        Parameters:
        minimumSize - The MinimumSize.
        maximumSize - The MaximumSize.

      • NodeSizeConstraintProvider

        public NodeSizeConstraintProvider(ISize minimumSize,
                                  ISize maximumSize,
                                  IRectangle minimumEnclosedArea)
        Creates a new instance using the provided size instances as the initial values.

        Not specifing the minimumEnclosedArea will set it to RectD.EMPTY.

        Parameters:
        minimumSize - The MinimumSize.
        maximumSize - The MaximumSize.
        minimumEnclosedArea - The MinimumEnclosedArea.

      • getMaximumSize

        public SizeD getMaximumSize(INode node)
        Description copied from interface: INodeSizeConstraintProvider
        Returns the maximum size allowed for the given node.
        Specified by:
        getMaximumSize in interface INodeSizeConstraintProvider
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the maximum size for.
        Returns:
        The maximum size or SizeD.INFINITE if there is no constraint on the size.

      • getMinimumEnclosedArea

        public final IRectangle getMinimumEnclosedArea()
        Gets the instance to return by getMinimumEnclosedArea(INode).
        Returns:
        The MinimumEnclosedArea.
        See Also:

      • getMinimumEnclosedArea

        public RectD getMinimumEnclosedArea(INode node)
        Description copied from interface: INodeSizeConstraintProvider
        Returns the minimum area that needs to be enclosed by the given node.
        Specified by:
        getMinimumEnclosedArea in interface INodeSizeConstraintProvider
        Parameters:
        node - The node to return the area for.
        Returns:
        The area to enclose or RectD.EMPTY if there is no constraint on the size due to an enclosed area.
